page.title: 06TRADE
page.content: BENTLAWNT SHOP AND POST OFFICE THE STABLES INN. THE DRUM AND MONKEY. The shop in Bentlawnt provides every shopping facility for the area,being a very well stocked store, with a full range of tinned and frozen foods, also fresh fruit and vegetables.Every need is also catered for in the crockery and hardware section.A bread and grocery delivery service is provided for those who are unable to get to the shop,a video exchange is also offered. In the post office section the local people obtain their pensions and allowances, and pay water,general rates and telephone bills.The shop is a very light,bright and cheerful place, and has won several awards in recent years in connection with the Shropshire Brightest Village Shop Competition.Also providing a service to the area are 2 public houses, having regular dances.
